Standard.Name: [Harlekin Mod] Arctic Item Mod: Rerun trigger: Intermediate Arctic 2.1
Fergus, the Venison Chef

English.Text: Fergus, the Venison Chef

Standard.Name: item fluff Fergus, the Venison Chef

English.Text: The expert for cooking deer.

Standard.Name: Ishmael the bycatch-processor

English.Text: Ishmael the bycatch-processor

Standard.Name: item fluff Ishmael the bycatch-processor

English.Text: No matter what he finds in the nets, Ishmael will make something useful out of it.

Standard.Name: Anton from the mountains

English.Text: Anton from the mountains

Standard.Name: item fluff Anton from the mountains

English.Text: Anton has left his home in the mountains of the old world to show the world what stylish designs he has to offer.

Standard.Name: Anya the Whaling Lobbyist

English.Text: Anya the Whaling Lobbyist

Standard.Name: item fluff Anya the Whaling Lobbyist

English.Text: After a long discussion with city councilors, she was able to get the switch to electric streetlights delayed.

Standard.Name: Esther Hofwegen, the animal loving cook

English.Text: Esther Hofwegen, the animal loving cook

Standard.Name: item fluff Esther Hofwegen, the animal loving cook

English.Text: Esther wants to harm as few animals as possible so she utilizes every last bit of them.

Standard.Name: Bjorn Hallqvist, the Experienced Ranger

English.Text: Bjorn Hallqvist, the Experienced Ranger

Standard.Name: item fluff Bjorn Hallqvist, the Experienced Ranger

English.Text: After roaming the woods of the old world for months, he is now looking for a new challenge.

Standard.Name: Knud McCrane, Member of the geographical Society

English.Text: Knud McCrane, Member of the geographical Society

Standard.Name: item fluff Knud McCrane, Member of the geographical Society

English.Text: On his countless succesful expeditions to the north, he has learned to survive without products from the old world and rather to rely on local goods.

Standard.Name: Konrad Moreau, Expert for Animal Behaviour

English.Text: Konrad Moreau, Expert for Animal Behaviour

Standard.Name: item fluff Konrad Moreau, Expert for Animal Behaviour

English.Text: Konrad has studied the animals for so long that they have become his best friends and he lets them live in his house.

Standard.Name: Clara Marell, Master of Woodcarvings

English.Text: Clara Marell, Master of Woodcarvings

Standard.Name: item fluff Clara Marell, Master of Woodcarvings

English.Text: She gets a sparkle in her eye when she finds a nice piece of wood and when she can make a toy for a child out of it, she will be even happier.

Standard.Name: Amanda Flores, Empress of Textile Production

English.Text: Amanda Flores, Empress of Textile Production

Standard.Name: item fluff Amanda Flores, Empress of Textile Production

English.Text: She rules over an empire of sewing machines that she exports to countries all over the world and now she has discovered the Arctic as a gap in the market.

Standard.Name: Eric Nylund, Inventor of the Pocket Lighter

English.Text: Eric Nylund, Inventor of the Pocket Lighter

Standard.Name: item fluff Eric Nylund, Inventor of the Pocket Lighter

English.Text: Each delivery of Eric's handy pocket lighters always includes a few cigars to celebrate the successful business deal.

Standard.Name: Jonah Northburg, Muncher of Mammal Meat

English.Text: Jonah Northburg, Muncher of Mammal Meat

Standard.Name: item fluff Jonah Northburg, Muncher of Mammal Meat

English.Text: The story goes that Jonah was swallowed by a whale and survived by eating the whale from the inside out. Although no one knows the truth, it is known that he disappeared for a while and after his return he had developed an appetite for the flesh of sea mammals.

Standard.Name: Irvin Flynn, the Gas Prospector

English.Text: Irvin Flynn, the Gas Prospector

Standard.Name: item fluff Earvin Flynn, the Gas Prospector

English.Text: He knows how to find gas and how to extract it without causing an explosion.

Standard.Name: Georg von Schallert, Commander of the Royal Airship Fleet

English.Text: Georg von Schallert, Commander of the Royal Airship Fleet

Standard.Name: item fluff Georg von Schallert, Commander of the Royal Airship Fleet

English.Text: His ancestors had always been close to the royal family, so it was clear that he would be the first to help build the royal airship fleet.

Standard.Name: +30% population Specialist

English.Text: Rufu Niriunaq, The Warm Bundle of Joy

Standard.Name: item fluff Rufu Niriunaq, The Warm Bundle of Joy

English.Text: Even if the clothes no longer keep you warm, her smile will melt your heart for sure.

Standard.Name: Specialists - Trade Union
Specialists - Arctic
Specialists - All
